comment.author: 21686909@N07
comment._content: Thanks for uploading these photos.  I had not realized there was a hard ball women's team this early.

comment.author: 54904823@N00
comment._content: I started a Wikipedia entry: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/New_York_Female_Giants The captain was Ida Schnall and I started an entry for her too: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ida_Schnall A member of the team is arrested for holding a pay game on the Sabbath. An undercover officer buys a program from a team member. [http://www.flickr.com/photos/richard_arthur_norton/4126321090/]
